text: @Mike_Pence Liar. You don't care for the sanctity of human life. Dominionists are selective on the topic - whatever serves your cause. Why did pro-Putin advisor & felon Paul Manafort choose you? If you cared, you/Trump would have responded to the Coronavirus appropriately from the start. /1
